page.title: 05TRANSPORT-THE A12
page.content: THE AI2 DUAL CARRIAGEWAY AND MOTORWAY FROM LONDON TO NORWICH CUTS ACROSS THE GRID,AND HAS HAD QUITE A MAJOR IMPACT ON ALL SORTS OF ASPECTS OF LIFE WITHIN THE GRID.FIRSTLY,BY TRAVELLING ON THE ROAD TOWARDS CHELMS- FORD,THE MOTORIST CAN JOIN THE LONDON ORBITAL MOTORWAY,THE M25.THIS OPENS UP QUICK AND CONVENIENT ACCESS TO THE NATIONAL MOTORWAY GRID.SECONDLY,THE A12 MEANS THAT A LOT OF PEOPLE CAN LIVE IN THE GRID,IN THE COUNTRYSIDE, YET WORK IN LONDON AND THE EASTERN SECTION OF GREATER LONDON.THIRDLY,THE A12 HAS HELPED IN THE DEVELOPMENT OF COLCHESTER,WHICH IS NOW A VERY THRIVING TOWN. THIS HAS BROUGHT A LOT OF NEW PEOPLE INTO THE GRID-PEOPLE WHO WISH TO LIVE IN THE COUNTRY BUT STILL HAVE QUICK ACCESS TO LONDON.THUS THE AI2 HAS HELPED TO PUSH UP HOUSE PRICES IN THE DISTRICT QUITE CONSIDERABLY.
